website_summaries.verdict: The Sling Media Slingbox Solo is fantastic. If you're not bothered by the fact it only supports one source at a time, and lacks a TV tuner, the Solo is the best way to control and watch your TV on a laptop or mobile phone
cons: supports only one source at a time

customer_reviews.title: worse company ever
customer_reviews.text: when it works, it's great. you're lucky to get 2yrs out of it. Tech support wants money to do anything. The firm ware crashed and I just wanted to them to do a hard reset, because you cant do it yourself, but they wanted almost what I paid for it. It was great when it came out(the only plug and play on the market at the time) and still easier to use then most other products. The only people that I know that use it is a high end corporate A/V company that uses them for remote log in to test picture quality and trouble shooting, then just tosses them when they crash
customer_reviews.author: stephen allen

customer_reviews.title: good product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is an older model so there is no wifi connection. So I had to run a 50 ft network line to the sling box from router. But it works great. It was a lot cheaper than the newer models. And was even less expensive on Amazon used like new. The initial set up from sling box app was a little challenging. But once downloaded and updated. It works great. Was worth the price and effort!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: When the Slingbox SOLO works, it does a great job. Unfortunately, I went through three boxes in two years (two new, one used). Three stikes and I'm out. I am not sure if it is a heat problem or just overall poorly designed. With so many ways to stream Amazon,Netflix, HBO, Showtime, My FIOS, etc., I no longer have any need for a Slingbox. I will say that the price paid on Amazon was by far less then any other retailers, including Ebay and other online retailers.
customer_reviews.author: lasermarc1

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would get the sling box after using sling on Dish and loving it. I used this device for Directv, but it didn't even come close to what sling could do with Dish. This device sat on top of the directv box and had a sensor that had to be located near the receiver. In order for the video feed to come through the directv box needed to be set on 720p resolution. This was a pain to constantly be changing to allow the device to work. And if I forgot to change it manually, I could change it once accessed online. So the device became useless if I forgot to make that settings change.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Denlinger

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: I love my slingbox. I purchased it in July of 2008, and the only issue i have had was replacing the $20 power cord. The iPhone app for it works pretty well. It is extremely clutch when you are away from televisions during football season (particularly those selfish folks that get married on Saturday nights in the fall). The price has surprisingly gone up about $20 since i purchased mine, but it is a solid investment, and you won't be disappointed. I have used my slingbox in Mexico, Asia, Caribbean, Europe, and Hawaii with no problems. I really do not understand how this is legal. I strongly recommend this for anyone who wants directv on their iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, Audio/Video Cord included did not work ...
customer_reviews.text: Save your money, Audio/Video Cord included did not work, was not in original box, just a plastic bag in an old cardboard box. Tried to email seller, no response, the day I recived it was the last day I could return the item. Choppy picture despite the fact I direct connect the Slinbbox into my router and watch it on my local network. A real piece of junk.Wish I had saved my money. Save your money and dont buy Slingbox
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn't like the idea watching TV on the fly
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't like the idea watching TV on the fly? This was easy to set up and register and I loved that it allowed me to watch TV in my kitchen or across the world on my laptop/iPad/iPhone. Be sure to keep the cable box powered up or else you won't be able to watch anything. Also, if the cable box is located in a place that gets touched or bumped, you may want to get some extra adhesive so the LED things that need to be lined up just so with the front of the cable box don't get moved out of place. If they do you won't be able to change channels and such.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Functional but needy
customer_reviews.text: If you like watching jerky grainy video then this is great. At home over the local network the HD works fine but I'm talking about when I really need it - away from home. Unless you invest in an expensive Internet connection with super high UP loading speed (most ISPs severely restrict this compared to their downloading speed) you can't use HD and it takes forever to do anything. VERY sensitive to voltage spikes - lost 2 in one year from lightning when nothing else in my house was affected and I have LOTS of electronic toys. Not paying for a 3rd with everything else available on line today, who needs this anyway?
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Guy

customer_reviews.title: PURE JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This once mediocre device has been degraded to to little more than a paper weight. it is advertised to work with Roku. This is crudely and ineffectively accomplished when routed through an iPhone rendering the iPhone unusable while acting as a relay. that's absurd and Sling should be ashamed to advertise this as a feature. The Sling interface is no longer a native application and now runs in a browser, clumsy and inelegant. Don't waste your moneyq unless you are in the market for an over priced lighted paper weight. I give it -5 stars
customer_reviews.author: FrequentBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: The sling box is probably the greatest invention since tv and the smartphone! I travel on the train a lot back and forth to work and wanted to use my smartphone to watch tv, however I do not want to pay additional subscription fees. The sling box is a one time purchase! It takes only minutes to set up. Install the app on your phone or iPad and your watching tv in minutes. If you have a DVR at home even better because it can control your DVR, so you can watch your recorded shows. I use this on my Droid X phone and on my iPad. Picture and sound quality is very good! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: My slingbox has just failed after just over a year and a half of use ... I was quite disappointed to find that many other slingbox users are experiencing the same issue: Error: 0x923400dc Context: 0 Operation:3 So it was great while it lasted - but expensive ($150) for the amount of time that it lasted. Looking at the other reviews here (and elsewhere on the internet) I am reluctant to buy another slingbox. I now feel that it is an overpriced niche product that is prone to failure. I would happily try an alternative product but have yet to find anything else that will do the job ...
customer_reviews.author: M. Lane

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad. I can watch on another PC on the same network (hooked up to a TV) and it looks lightly better than SD TV, not quite HD. On my laptop when I'm on the road, it's choppy. That may be the connection, because I use an old Xbox wireless adapter to connect it to my network. When you click the remote, it's like you fast forward time for a second. You have to get used to it. But if you leave it alone and just watch the TV, it's pretty good. My friend even used it to watch a UFC PPV at his house using a giant projector on his wall, and said it was very good.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Terrible seller item never worked and they wouldn’t help
customer_reviews.text: My son went away for a couple of months and when he came back he set it up it NEVER WORKED!! Sling box wouldn’t offer any support because it was an older model. Seller unwilling to do anything to help. Guess seller shouldn’t even be selling this model. They were very happy to take my money for a useless item. Stay clear from them
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Great little box if you like to watch your TV away from home
customer_reviews.text: You'll need a fast system and a fast connection to make it work right. Our XP laptop was marginal. Our Vista and Windows 7 systems did much better. Our sons Mac did very well when he loged in from a different state. Setup was straight forward. I had do do a little tweeking to make it available on the net. I hooked it to an older Samsung VCR player/recorder with a DVD player. The remote for that machine was available. The VCR can even be controlled with the slingbox. So if it's your TV you'd like to watch via the internet the Slingbox would be woth a look.
customer_reviews.author: XKarDoc

customer_reviews.title: Loved It
customer_reviews.text: I used to watch my home TV from work on an iPhone 3G (this was 2008-09) an amazing feat of technology for that time... until I tuned in one afternoon and it wasn't working...? Ya... someone stole it.... they left behind the power adapter and an ability to reset the factory settings so someone else could use it though... so it was a useless $130 brick to that burglar.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Drones

customer_reviews.title: Great find if you're looking for a Slingbox on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great find if you're looking for a Slingbox on the cheap. It's not HD and may not even be supported by Slingbox much longer, but for now it adequately streams my cablebox to my phone, tablet and browser without any trouble. Totally worth buying this older model and avoiding the $100 HD versions now being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Levin

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Solo
customer_reviews.text: The slingbox solo is easy to install. I pulled cat5 cable from my router to the slingbox so I would have a wired connection. It was about fifty feet of wiring. Within my house the slingbox works like a charm, but outside where I connect by the internet, the quality is determined by the upload speed of your DSL. Mine is supposed to be 384k, but rarely does my AT&T DSL operate at the speeds that are advertised. The longer I am connected, the better the quality gets. I assume this is because the buffering gets deeper. It is not perfect, but I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Elliott Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great streaming device
customer_reviews.text: The slingbox solo is a great device, you can connect your cable box, dvd, tv and directly stream it to your iphone or laptop. The image quality is awesome on wifi, depending on your cellular network, the quality can be acceptable.If you use composite video the image improves significantly. Just make sure you connect your power supply adapter to a surge protector. I made the mistake to connect it directly to a wall outlet, and lighting storm hit burned the circuit inside. Overall a great and useful product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Saenz

customer_reviews.title: DOA...Got the 350 instead.
customer_reviews.text: Mine was DOA (network port was bad)...otherwise I would have like to try it. The price was dirt cheap. I got the 350 instead. Same configuration, but with the 350 and a tivo, you can just use the component cables to the slingbox and still use the HDMI direct from you TiVo to your TV. The solo forced me to abandon the HDMI to my TV and only use component cables with the solo between my TV and tivo.
customer_reviews.author: TheShark

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Solo
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought the "Solo" model to replace my Slingbox "AV" model. I Needed the Solo model to be able to use the SlingPlayer application for my Android Samsung Charge Smart phone. Had both the Slingbox solo and Slingplayer App. for my phone up and running in about one hour. The Slingbox Solo works great with my Directv satellite dvr. And the Slingplayer application for my Samsung Android Charge smartphone performs beyond my expectations. I recommend this product highly.
customer_reviews.author: Shutterbug

customer_reviews.title: but these people are the worst! There are alternatives out there
customer_reviews.text: Glitchy, rip off and a P.O.S.!!!!! I firmly believe that they purposely build in programming glitches so people will have to call tech support, at which time they tell you it's $30 bucks for said support. I'm not a person who gets off on slamming companies and products with scathing reviews, but these people are the worst! There are alternatives out there, take them!
customer_reviews.author: RSA

customer_reviews.title: They will get it working on your system
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was timely, hook up and setup instructions were easy to follow. However, the last step, when it was downloading software, failed. Repeatedly. Eventually called support. They were great, easy to work with. The install was difficult but they assured me they would get it to work. It ended up taking two calls and about 1.5 hours on the phone, but they got it working beautifully. In use it is as described, wherever you get a good connection the experience is similar to sitting in front of your TV with your remote. Picture quality is directly proportional to connection and hardware quality.
customer_reviews.author: Harry n Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says although the price is a little high in my opinion. The software that you load on your PC is very nice as it will buffer the video and let you fast forward without using your DVR remote. Video quality is dependent on network and Internet conditions. Don't expect HD quality via the internet unless you have a very fast Internet connection. On my home network it works flawlessly with excellent quality. I am glad to see that the Slingcatchers price has been reduced as this will be my next purchase and allow me utilize my SlingBox a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: David Yoder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great technology. My brother has one. Even for watching in your own home. The bid advangage to this one over previous similar models (A/V) is that this one has AV passthough, so you can daisy chain with your other equipment without 'losing' an output. B&H has it for 139 now, so I'm hoping Amazon will follow suit soon, and I will definately buy one so when I got on a business trip, I can still view my Tivo. And in a few months, you'll be able to stream it to your iPod Touch or Phone. Already can do with Blackberry. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Slingbox since they first came out. My ancient, no longer supported, model just worked out of the box. I tried two of these new "improved" Solo models. The first one was simply not discoverable on my network. The second would not go through the configuration process. Tech support was useless. I returned the units and bought a Vulkano Flow. It worked, the first time, immediately. It is what the Slingbox used to be. What can I say, it is cheaper, better and simply works. Buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Dubnoff

customer_reviews.title: Love it , just upgraded to the HD version
customer_reviews.text: I love this slingbox , i use it all the time comes in quite handy during football season and works really well. Just recently upgraded to a newer HD model that i haven't had the opportunity to use yet but looking forward to. Definately a cheaper alternative to getting NFL sunday ticket on Direct TV
customer_reviews.author: Jay R

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since TV
customer_reviews.text: I dont even leave my home office anymore. With a dual monitor setup and Slingbox broadcasting. I can get so much work done at home without missing my quirky shows I like to watch and if I do miss them I can just pull up my DVR on my slingbox and watch them when I can. When I do have to go to work I can still watch on my laptop in a small box to the left of my work space. The picture quality is not as good on a wireless internet signal as it is on a wired line like at home but it works. I love this little box.
customer_reviews.author: LongDread

customer_reviews.title: My
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to set up and allows you to watch your home TV by accessing the Slingbox via the internet while traveling. Results are excellent right down to the working image of your home remote that appears on your PC which allows you to controll your home TV from your remote PC. The TV picture quality is excellent and streams flawlessly to your PC with no breaks or pauses. I reccommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas P

customer_reviews.title: Good idea that works great while it works.
customer_reviews.text: The real function of a Slingbox is good and mine worked fine for a while but then, my old Slingbox died. Replacing it turned out to be a nightmare. I simply gave up. It's too bad because the old one worked just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Albert B. Duckett

customer_reviews.title: Better than I imagined
customer_reviews.text: I had plenty of reservations about this product. First, it was a technology I wasn't too familiar with. Second, we live out in the boonies and our bandwith is very low. Third, will this thing work and if not, I'll be out $150. Well, this thing works!!! The cool thing about the solo is that it compensates for a crummy connection. Now, the video may be fuzzy at times, at least you get a program. The image is usually fine and when it fuzzes-up, I know the problem is mine, not the box. I think this is an amazing product!!
customer_reviews.author: JohnDM90

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought a slingbox more than a year ago and I thought it was great, but without a Mac client it was useless to me. When this year's Tour de France came on I REALLY wanted to watch at the office and so with a Mac client now available I bought the SOLO. What an amazing device. On the home network the picture is astounding, over the internet, it is amazingly clean and smooth. My only down check is that I am still waiting on an iPhone client. A great gadget, I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blair D. Callicott

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system for watching your TV remotely
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system for watching your TV remotely. I traveled a lot and often missed my home teams sporting events but this allowed me to watch them on my laptop anywhere I had an internet connection. They are numerous alternatives now but this has served me well for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Austin

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 3 solid months
customer_reviews.text: Received unit timely and it worked well for a few months but will no longer power on. As a side note, customer service for Slingbox is about as bad as I have seen. Attempted calls average hold time of over 45 minutes. Attempting to connect over the internet to chat average wait time is over an hour. That tells me one of two things....To few service techs, or to many issues with the units. Either way, very unhappy with the whole thing.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Neat toy but DIES after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: It does what it says it does. Moreover, the customer support is fabulous within the first 90 days. I had a problem setting up my IP addresses and in five minutes support was able to diagnose, find, and solve the problem. However, a year later I had to pay $29.99 to find out it was dead and could not get it replaced without paying roughly $100. It is not worth the price if it will only last one year. SLING MEDIA GET YOUR ACT TOGETHER OR LOWER THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Dolamyt

customer_reviews.title: Better get the extended warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Three failures in a year and a half, now it is out of the original warranty although the replacement lasted less than 9 months. Customer service is horrible - they see nothing wrong with a product that fails with such regularity. You are essentially paying for a year of use if you buy this, nothing more.. This is one product that would be worth buying the extended warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: My best friend while abroad.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Slingbox to help provide some entertainment while I travel worldwide as a cargo pilot. Many countries I visit have little or no English TV. Now I can keep up with shows and/or maintain a feeling of home via this device. I control my DVR in my living room from anywhere in the world! Awesome! The newer version have some very good upgrades but since I do not own an HD screen other than my laptop, the SOLO works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: Garwa

customer_reviews.title: Died, support is awful
customer_reviews.text: Died after a year and a half. Frankly, I expected better for the price I paid. Support is non-existent, and they demand 30 bucks just to talk to them. EDIT: I opened this up, since my 1 year warranty was expired. Sure enough, just like hundreds of other people, I've got 2 blown capacitors. Sling Media has MAJOR quality control issues with this hardware. Do not buy unless you're comfortable with a soldering iron.
customer_reviews.author: David Vermillion

customer_reviews.title: So cool...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas because he travels a lot for work and misses all the shows we watch. He LOVES it. He is a very technical person and said it was one of the easiest pieces of equipment he has ever set up. He has used it both domestically and internationally it and works beautifully. I even find myself using on my computer when I want to sneak in some uninterrupted TV viewing where I don't have a TV. And it is very, very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Dawg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little machine.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this machine for several months now and have not had one problem. Setup was simple. I parked it next to my TV and router. Came in handy in Bali in October where I was able to watch the 49ers on my netbook. Granted, the "reception" was not crystal clear but watching TV on a netbook is not like watching it on my 55" Mitsubishi either. Paid $120 during a Gold Box offer so one might be able to wait for a price dip from current pricing.
customer_reviews.author: Rick the TR6 guy

customer_reviews.title: Sling Junk Box
customer_reviews.text: Video quality was simply terrible. Perhaps I got a defective unit or could be that this unit does NOT have HDMI. Either way, I tried it and was looking forward to watching football remotely, but could not stand it for even 10 minutes. Tried a couple other times, but no good. It was that bad. Sent it right back and got screwed by AMAZON for shipping costs too. I would stay away from this.
customer_reviews.author: tj

customer_reviews.title: Returned Defective - Replacement has not failed
customer_reviews.text: Would have gotten 5 stars, but had to return defective to manufacture after out of warranty. They still sent a replacement. Turns out this model was known to fail account poor components. Much newer versions available from Sling to replace this now. I love the service and use on iPod and iTouch.
customer_reviews.author: Trainslayer

customer_reviews.title: Slling Box works great.
customer_reviews.text: We are RVer and for many years used DirecTV. With my packages it cost us about $95 a month. With the Sling Box I just hooked it up to the DircTV DVR at home then to my broadband modem and that was it. We camp where there is WIFI and the service is free. I still can't believe how well it works. I need to buy the bridge too since my DircTV DVR and my broadband modem are in different rooms. Still works like a champ.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Cook

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't actually get this to work well. Tried ...
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't actually get this to work well. Tried lots but still unsuccessful. This product ended up in my store waiting for me to have more time & patience to test this out again.
customer_reviews.author: roseazam

customer_reviews.title: A little bit of Magic
customer_reviews.text: This technology is amazing. I wish I got this sooner. Now I can flip on my TV and watch it from anywhere using my android phone, or from work using a browser (no google chrome support :( ) I wish it wasn't a browser that we had to use. Why couldn't just be a program that get's installed (because that's what it's doing through the browser anyways). It that was the case, industrious people could make that work on linux. Oh well, I'll have android for those times.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S

customer_reviews.title: .78 mps upload but it is working great.
customer_reviews.text: I only have a .78 mps upload but it is working great. Newer slingbox model require 1-2 mps depending pn hd or sd quality. This model will work with 1/2 mps . If you don't have very fast upload you need this model.
customer_reviews.author: alton sanders

customer_reviews.title: You get exactly what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I love my Slingbox. If you travel alot or want to be able to watch TV remotely this is a must have. If your just hooking it up to a DVR I would probably just get the solo. When I watch HD brodcast it is pretty clear. I am sure the Sling Box Pro HD is better, but it is twice the price. With the addition of [...] you can watch your TV from any computer with an internet connection. There is no need to install the sling player on a friends computer to just show off your sling box.
customer_reviews.author: L. James

customer_reviews.title: Great product and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was able to connect to it from a hotel where we only had a few channels. It gave us the ability to watch our normal programs while being away from home. Easy to setup and use. It will change the channels on your cable box though, so it's easier to use on a tv that nobody else would be using while you are gone.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and use! Got this to replace one I had for years that I thought was broken...turns out it was my Ethernet cable between this and my router. Oh well, now I have 2 and they both work amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works brilliantly, set-up is a challenge
customer_reviews.text: Slingbox performs just as advertised. I see my DVR from almost every remote broadband connection (even on the other side of the globe in an Auckland cafe & my Sydney hotel room). The set-up is a real challenge, getting laptop security, wifi router, and DVR all aligned was a tester. But the on-line Slingbox support is the BEST! Slingbox lets me see the Lakers and Dodgers from anywhere. I travel for a living and having Slingbox helps get me to my home teams when I am on the road. Giving me something to look forward to in the hotel room.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Ricketts

customer_reviews.title: Slingboxes are the best invention since the television!
customer_reviews.text: I had an original, SD analog Slingbox, but had to upgrade because the Android app didn't work on that version. I have to say, I still love it! The only real difference between the "classic" and the SOLO is HD. When I have a good Internet signal, the picture on my SG Tab 10.1 is amazing. It's okay on my HTC EVO, too, but better on my tablet.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This worked great. We forgot to hook it back up after we moved and went on vacation. The only part that I don't like is the dependence on the slingbox web site and lack of live support. I think the website went down for a while and I was unable to access this from where I was. I have not used the mobile app so I cannot comment on that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product to anyone. If you feel you must purchase this product, make sure you pay for the 49.99 3 year warranty. Without it, you will not be able to get customer support for it without paying 29.99 per session. Utterly ridiculous. Mine quit working after 4 months (got it for xmas) and they refuse any help at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't have make it work.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't have make it work. Slingbox doesn't provide assistance anymore for these old products.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D.

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as advertised. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this so I could watch NFL games while I am at little league soccer games. I have been using it on an iPhone with a 3G network. You need a good signal but this has been a fantastic addition to my tech platform. I used it last week from Denmark to watch the Monday Night game. Good living. If you intend to use it with an iPhone or iPad don't forget to include the cost of those apps in with the price. Still a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Highschoolrival

customer_reviews.title: Wife has her Sox
customer_reviews.text: Trying to get the Red Sox on my boat was a nightmare. Without having cable tv, there is no way to get it live. The MLB package was blacked-out until 90 minutes post-game, and that wouldn't be worth it. Now, I just fire up the laptop (connected to the flat screen on the boat) and connect through the wifi to my box back at home. Wife has the game, and I have peace. My only complaint...$30 for the iphone app..please!! I wouldn't bother watching it, but if I forget to record a show, I would have liked to been able to do it from the iphone on the road. Not worth the $30 though.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It's an older model but handles streaming within the house as advertised. I purchased just as the new models were being introduced and picked this puppy up at a huge discount so if you can find one of these out there new, grab it if your interested in watching TV on your devices at home. If your looking to remote log-in to your home cable service I;d recommend grabbing a newer slingbox as this model won't stream at high enough bit rate to get a real good quality picture. Bottom line: for $59 bucks there is zero solutions for this device on the market and it's a no-brainer. Follow me on twitter: @JBossRecruiter
customer_reviews.author: MyTechSales

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Slingbox.  Too bad the Bears aren't worth watching.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you slingbox (and family up north). Bought my slingbox this year hoping to catch Bears games, thinking they'd be good. Thank God I didn't spend money on Direct TV & Sunday ticket. $80 for slingbox vs $1000's for direct tv. Easy call.
customer_reviews.author: Perdido

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...
customer_reviews.text: This item did not work for me because I only have a hotspot. However, it uses a lot of data. There is a restocking fee with this seller which was not mentioned when I bought it and read the return statement. They were very nice when I returned it but I was out $20.00.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: The instructions on how to set up are a little difficult. They don't list all of the current boxes (cable/satellite) so it is difficult to set up. Then, when we tried to call customer service, they needed a copy of our receiptin order to help. Because 90 days after initial purchase, they charge to do customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Emma M. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Its functional
customer_reviews.text: requires a direct hook up to the router or you have to buy another adapter for about $30. Its an older model and probably says so in the description somewhere. Just a reminder to read all the specs
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Short life!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! unless you want a Slingbox for a door stop. I bought the Slingbox(SB260-100) (Old Model) on July of last year, and now it does not turn on. It worked for about seven months before it died. It seems to have a burnt smell coming out of the air vent. A week ago I put in a request for an exchange, and the vendor pretty much told me I was out of luck. Good product when it works, unfortunately the Slingbox solo did not last for me.
customer_reviews.author: German O. Monroy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. EASY to set up. Great.
customer_reviews.text: Directions and website were a piece of cake to set up and it works flawlessly. The only issue is Internet Explorer and the add-ons are a little glitchy. All that is required is a restart of IE. If that is the worst thing about this, that is a great thing. Would highly recommend this to anyone who travels and wants to watch their local sports channels.
customer_reviews.author: ecmmmm

customer_reviews.title: Seems great
customer_reviews.text: I live in Mexico but have an office in the U.S., so Slingbox allows me to watch some of my favorite shows at home. It seems that the Slingbox works great but due to really slow internet download speeds here my picture is so-so. I imagine that if my download speed was better that I'd get a great picture.....
customer_reviews.author: David M. Rubenstein

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy set-up
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! We live out of the country and it is nice to get US news and sports. We even got up in the middle of the night to watch the BCS championship. To get the Slingbox set up in our house in the US took quite a bit longer than the hour that is estimated. We even had to get a new router because our old one was not recognized by the Slingbox.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: What technology products should be like
customer_reviews.text: This product is a miracle, and I'm sorry I didn't buy it long ago. I had it setup, installed, and activated within minutes...if only other tech items were so easy and intuitive. It requires NO fiddling and just WORKS. I can watch on my PC or iPhone (with additional $30 purchase of the slingbox app) with decent fidelity from anywhere where there's internet or 3G access. Hurray! There's no iPad app yet, but hopefully will be coming soon (the iphone video quality on the iPad is just fair).
customer_reviews.author: T. Pick

customer_reviews.title: Good for watching on a PC, not for TV
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to watch it on PC, then it is worth it. If you plan to watch the shows on TV using connected devices like Logitech Revue, WDTV live, don't bother with this. After all the excitements, you will be very disappointed to know they are couple of years away from pushing out a workable models.
customer_reviews.author: Peter M. Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't do without it.
customer_reviews.text: When my Slingbox died, I tried to see if I could do without replacing it--but found I couldn't! I missed watching Yankee games when I was away from home and watching better shows than the bad cable selections in some hotels. One of my favorite things ever.
customer_reviews.author: Frances A.

customer_reviews.title: Choppy picture when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: I am not really impressed with the slingbox...we got a ROKU and the app doesnt even work not to mention that after you buy the slingbox you have to purchase the slingbox app for $15 for it to work with the ROKU. By working I mean it wont connect half the time and the other half of the time it is choppy and cuts out. All and all I am not impressed with this...I would not waste your money...until they fix it where it actually works its not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Solo
customer_reviews.text: I own some of the very old Sling Boxes that required software to be installed on the remote PC. This unit only requires an Internet browser and an ActiveX insert. Setup was simple and the picture quality is very good. There is no TV Tuner of any kind in this box (like the older units) so you must connect it to a cable box, etc. For those that spend the Winter in Florida, this is a neat gadget.
customer_reviews.author: WBevis

customer_reviews.title: A must have item!
customer_reviews.text: If you are on the road or traveling a lot this is a must have item. You can watch live tv or your recorded show from the DVR in your pc, website or cellphone (must buy the $29 software). This is my 2nd Slingbox and I love it. I have it connected to a Dish Network receivers 722 and 612.
customer_reviews.author: R Roman

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and is an awesome product, but be careful not to plug in the wrong power cord. After doing some moving, we got the power cord mixed up and plugged in the wrong one. It no longer works. This was our fault, & after doing some reading I found a warning, but the unit lasted only about a year.
customer_reviews.author: DK16

customer_reviews.title: How long will it last?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Slingbox Solo so I could watch my TIVO any where in the world. 1 year later here is where I am at now. I was never able to get the Slingbox video out of my home network. In network it worked great. I tried several times using Slingbox's customer support but we never were able to get the signal out of the network. So I settled for at least I could watch the box in network. Now the box will not stream the video more then 30 seconds on my home network. If you want to get help $29.95 and if the hardware is bad $99.95.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mayou

customer_reviews.title: Neat!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome device. I can now watch my Tivo from anywhere in the world. Setup was relatively easy. Quality is amazing. I thought the picture would look bad over the internet, but it doesn't. If you have a slow connection at your destination, you can throttle the bandwith down. All in all a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Martin O. Obiozor

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: There have been very few electronic items that I have purchased that have met or exceeded my expectations as this product has. Almost fully automated setup, worked the first time and the audio/video quality over my wireless G network is excellent. Didn't even need any tech support. The controls and applications have been very well designed and work quite effectively. Overall, this product is well worth the price and minimal effort to set up.
customer_reviews.author: FEC

customer_reviews.title: Works great for work
customer_reviews.text: I work in a very slow paced job and can get bored looking at the internet for 12 hours. This device fixes this problem. I linked it up to my cable box at home and it works amazingly. The video quality is perfect not choppy and doesn't lag at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Shoty

customer_reviews.title: Surprised how good the quality was
customer_reviews.text: This Slingbox is being used with a Kindle Fire HD 8.9 on a local network, and the video and sound quality are excellent. It's a bit slow too change channels (we calculate an 8-second delay), but once a channel is selected it works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: THD

customer_reviews.title: It took awhile
customer_reviews.text: I received this unit recently, and it took awhile to get it right. The sound is the problem that I had with this unit. It had an annoying hissing sound that is caused by the contection of too many audio wires. If you have an annoying sound coming from your computer after you have everything setup, discontect one of the audio setup contections. Your computer may only need one of these contections for the audio. Everything else worked right out the box. I have not used the system out of the home network area to state that the travel worthiness of the unit is up to snuff, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Ok - this is terrific.
customer_reviews.text: My family had recommended we purchase this item years ago - but we hesitated for whatever reason. WE ARE SO GLAD WE FINALLY DID IT. Super easy installation - great video quality, user friendly. GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: Megan e Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: very pleased when I opened the box
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time, very pleased when I opened the box, looks like new. It came in a ordinary brown box but the unit itself is wrap in a sealed plastic. I installed it to our TiVo dvr after few minutes I'm already watching in our pc in our bedroom. Very happy with it, specially my wife!
customer_reviews.author: mike31

customer_reviews.title: power cord not working
customer_reviews.text: I have seen many complaints about the power going out. I hardly used this and now no power. There is a problem with the power cord supplied
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product when I read many different review prior to my purchase. I decided to buy it due to the discount price and thought I took a chance to test it out. After I received and connected it and it was everything that I expected. I can watch m OWN TV every where I go. I watch it on my iPad, my Labtop and my cell phone. I love it. Thanks Slingbox. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: After owning for 5 years, Kindle Fire enabled viewing
customer_reviews.text: Glory be! Took it out of the shoe box and now can watch on my kindle fire anywhere with wifi, via clearspot.. Sweet. Purchased in 2008 for $155 and glad to see it is still alive and producing some results. Look out Aereo.
customer_reviews.author: Blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it. Listen to the negative reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Randomly stopped working after two years and the company won't proved any support unless you pay additional money. Sounds like the company makes additional profits when their products fail.
customer_reviews.author: PaulNJ

customer_reviews.title: Slingbox Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the Slingbox Solo. It does everything the company said it did. Installed very easily. My first trip out of town after it was installed was a place with a very slow internet connection. In spite of this, the Slingbox worked very well, Recommend highly.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gooch

customer_reviews.title: Product works, poorly manufactured
customer_reviews.text: The product definitely works as indicated by the manufacturer. In general, easy to set-up. However, the product is poorly manufactured. My primary gripe - the power cable does not fully seed into the connection, and can easily slip out.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: i remember back in the day this was an awesome way to watch tv on your phone
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: On my second until because the first one mysteriously stopped working. Seems to be a known issue that Sling Media isn't owning up to.
customer_reviews.author: MFA

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I use it to view my DVR in NJ when I am in NC, I have a very fast connection in NJ (50 meg) and a reasonably fast one in NC (runs at 10-20 meg). Even at those speeds I usually can't use the high quality feed, but it woeks well on the lower quality feeds. Note that you must use a hard wired ethernet connection for the box (not WiFi) and that there is a consicerable lag,, making it difficult to use the fast forward and other controls. It also takes annoyingky long to boot up and periodically stalls or needs to reset. All that being said, it does work and I am reasonably happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lesser

customer_reviews.title: Good product with one HUGE caveat...
customer_reviews.text: The big problem with this product is this: you can't use it if your TV is hooked up using HDMI, and your TV is turned off. This may not be true for every cable box/tv combo, but you won't know until you've bought and hooked up the product. It's an HDMI DRM issue, so it's not the fault of Slingbox, but they should do a better job warning people of this issue. You'll have 3 options if you run into this problem: always leave the TV on, use component instead of HDMI, or don't buy the Slingbox.
customer_reviews.author: R. Aiello

customer_reviews.title: Hardware is easy to install, software is confusing but great tech dept to assist your problem
customer_reviews.text: T result was extremely good, while I was watching US TV in Hong Kong. Installing is hardware was easy, synchronizing the Box and your PC is confusing for me. Fortunately, the Tech Dept @ Sling helped me through by phone. This is a Great Value and great Picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth C. Kao

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I slung this out the window. I never got it to work
customer_reviews.author: #TheHerringtens

customer_reviews.title: Works well, easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the Slingbox, it was easy to set up and works as expected. A typo in the setup instructions for Internet access caused a little problem that I figured out... {e.g. different port numbers in example and setup instructions..}
customer_reviews.author: George S. Radu

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in video quality
customer_reviews.text: I have the first generation Slingbox, then moved onto the previous version of Slingbox Solo, and now the SB260 because I want to be able to watch the HD quality on my iPad3 version of the SlingPlayer. Very very disappointed. Connected everything with the component cables - and had to switch to standard quality - which, needless to say, was not good at all. Cannot pull up any image at high quality, and standard quality IS WORSE than first generation SlingBox Solo!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twc

customer_reviews.title: sling it
customer_reviews.text: works as advertised, use it in hotel when want to escape hotel tv service and see things on home dvr. great customer service to help install. but, what is the new HULU thing coming out--will that be better?? Dunno.
customer_reviews.author: D. Rohrdanz

customer_reviews.title: Great concept
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of watching live tv or DVR from my phone and tablet! It took a long time to get up and running though. The instructions weren't super clear on what I needed. I now have a long cable across my house. It also took trouble-shooting and googling to figure out that I couldn't have it connected to our HD sets if the tv was already on at home. But once we worked out the kinks the box was a Decent investment. I wish the app were not so expensive though. So plan to buy extras to make your box work!
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Takes up bandwidth even when not in use
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat gadget, to be able to watch your TV anywhere. And it works great. The only complaint I have is it takes up a lot of bandwidth on your network even when you are not watching TV with it. DVG
customer_reviews.author: Lit'lBro

customer_reviews.title: sling box OK
customer_reviews.text: The slingbox works fine, but setting up was difficult. The box was made by Scientific Atlanta but it's listed under the carrier ATT. I needed help finding the proper code. It works well but you need an HD cable for best images.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Schram

customer_reviews.title: Great product for Snowbirds
customer_reviews.text: Does what I wanted it to do...... able to watch my Canadian TV in Arizona even my recorded stuff
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: What a great invention!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible system that provides full access to our cable TV package at any location on the planet (as long as there's broadband). Higher bandwidth on your wi-fi gives a better result and the "standard-quality" setting seems to work a little better. Adding the Slingbox app on the iPad for a one-time cost makes this a perfect entertainment package.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Device when you're on the Road
customer_reviews.text: I was able to watch my beloved Baltimore Ravens on my laptop while sitting in a parking lot Cody, Wyoming. 4-stars only because the picture quality could have been better, but, it worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Shy

product_meta.title: Sling Media Slingbox SOLO (SB260-100) (Old Model)
product_meta.description:
The Slingbox SOLO incorporates high-definition component, S-Video and composite video inputs as well as outputs, making it compatible with just about every HD or standard-definition satellite receiver or set-top boxes and DVRs on the market. The Slingbox SOLO is the perfect companion for your DVR, cable box, satellite receiver or DVD player. With the ability to watch and control your favorite TV source, the Slingbox SOLO ensures that you can enjoy your TV entertainment anywhere.What's in the box: Sling Box Slingbox Solo Internet TV Broadcaster, AC Adapter, Ethernet Cable, Quick Start Guide, Composite AV Cable, Remote Control IR Cable and 1-Year Limited Warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


SLINGBOX TURNS YOUR PC, MAC, TABLET OR SMARTPHONE INTO A TV.
 Never miss your home TV shows, regardless of where you are. Take your TV with you on the road. Easily connect the Slingbox SOLO to practically any one of your home-theater sources and watch your standard-definition (SD) or high-definition (HD) TV shows, sporting events or special programs on your PC, Mac, tablet or smartphone* over the internet, from anywhere in the world. 

EASILY CONNECT
 Connect to one HD or SD source in your home theater, such as your DVR, digital cable set-top box or satellite receiver. 

TAKE CONTROL
 Take complete control of your TV via the web with the comprehensive and easy-to-use on-screen remote control and electronic program guide (EPG). 

SIT BACK AND ENJOY
 Watch your favorite shows in crisp SD quality over the Internet via your PC, Mac, tablet or smartphone—from anywhere, anytime. 

NO MONTHLY FEES
 Watch and control your TV and its programming on your compatible device with no monthly subscription fee.* 

 *Download sold separately. Additional fees from your mobile provider may apply. 

CONNECTIONS
GETTING STARTED WITH SLINGBOX SOLO IS SIMPLE
 1. Connect the Slingbox to an A/V source, such as a DVR, cable set-top box or satellite receiver (The Slingbox is compatible with just about any AV source.)
 2. Connect the Slingbox to your home network (If your router is too far from your Slingbox for a direct connection, use the SlingLink TURBO or another Ethernet bridge for connectivity.)
 3. Fire up your PC or Mac computer from your home-network connection, complete the Slingbox setup and enjoy your very own home theater on your PC, Mac, tablet or smartphone.

WHAT DEVICES CAN I CONNECT?
 * Basic Cable TV Set-Top Box
 * Digital Cable Set-Top Box
 * DVRs (such as TiVo, Comcast, ReplayTV, DISH or one provided by your cable/satellite provider)
 * Blu-ray Disc™ Player/Recorder 
 * HD Component Input Support with Resolution Up to 1080i
 * Satellite Receiver such as DIRECTV or DISH
 * Video/Security Camera
 * Windows Media Center

WHAT DO I NEED TO WATCH ON MY LAPTOP?
 Watch and control your TV directly from Slingbox.com. Using Firefox, Internet Explorer or Safari, you have complete access to your Slingbox and its connected cable box, satellite receiver or DVR. You get a virtual remote control as well as a searchable TV guide—all without downloading or installing desktop software. 

VIRTUAL PROGRAM GUIDE AND REMOTE CONTROL
 View all of your television programming with the virtual program guide. With the on-screen remote control, change channels, pause, fast-forward or rewind and set up DVR recordings. 

POPUP VIDEO PLAYER
 Multitask while watching your TV, or if you prefer, watch your TV in full-screen mode. 

PC AND MAC SUPPORT
 Access your Slingbox from any high-speed Internet-connected PC or Mac laptop or desktop. 

WHAT DO I NEED TO WATCH ON MY SMARTPHONE OR TABLET?
 With SlingPlayer software (sold separately) watch your TV and all of its programming on your iPad, iPhone, BlackBerry, Android phone, Android tablet, Windows Phone, Palm OS or Symbian mobile devices. 

FULL CONTROL OF YOUR HOME TV
 Control your programming with easy-to-use menus and shortcuts on either a touch screen or navigational interface. Easily change your TV channels, navigate program guides and schedule recordings on your DVR. 

EASY ACCESS TO A WIDE RANGE OF DEVICES AND PROGRAMS
 Control your digital cable box, satellite receiver, DVR or DVD player. Access music channels or video on demand. 

HIGH-QUALITY VIEWING MODES
 Enjoy stunning full-screen video. Switch to audio-only mode to save bandwidth or battery life. Adjust the video display size or aspect ratio. (Audio-only mode and adjustable video display size are only supported on select devices.) 

TAKE ADVANTAGE OF HIGH-SPEED MOBILE INTERNET CONNECTIVITY
 Access your television programming over a high-speed 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi connection. (Check your mobile device and service for supported connectivity options. Some Android phones and tablets support 4G connections. The iPod touch only supports Wi-Fi connections.)
feature_bullets: Watch your HDTV anywhere on your laptop or mobile phone with no monthly fees
Watch and control a high-definition or standard definition A/V device, such as a DVR, cable set top box, satellite receiver or DVD player.
Full set of pass-through connections for easy integration with virtually any A/V device.
Clip+Sling ready. Use your Slingbox to clip segments of your favorite TV programs and share them with friends and family online.
Supports Windows XP/Vista, Mac and Windows Mobile, Symbian or Palm OS-based mobile devices.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars580 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
